rmacrostrat 0.0.1
  • Reference
    • Making a geologic outcrop map with rmacrostrat
    • Quantifying the geological completeness of paleontological sampling in North America
    • Plotting a stratigraphic column with rmacrostrat

Package index

Macrostrat data entities

Functions for retrieving entities that exist as part of the Macrostrat data hierarchy (i.e., units, sections/packages, and columns).

get_units()
Retrieve Macrostrat unit data
get_sections()
Retrieve Macrostrat section data
get_columns()
Retrieve Macrostrat column data
def_columns()
Define Macrostrat columns
get_age_model()
Retrieve Macrostrat column age models

Geologic map elements and sources

Functions for retrieving various elements (e.g., shapes, points, and legends) and metadata of geologic maps that have been ingested into the Macrostrat database.

get_map_outcrop()
Retrieve geologic map outcrop shape element data
get_map_points()
Retrieve geologic map point shape element data
get_map_legends()
Retrieve geologic map legend data
def_sources()
Retrieve geologic map source definitions

External data linked to Macrostrat entities

Functions for retrieving various external data (e.g., Paleobiology Database fossil occurrences, rock sample measurements) that have been linked to Macrostrat entities.

get_fossils()
Retrieve collections from the Paleobiology Database
get_eodp()
Retrieve core data from ocean drilling programs
def_drilling_sites()
Define objects associated with eODP
get_measurements()
Retrieve geological measurements
def_measurements()
Define measurements

Paleogeography

Functions for returning paleogeographic reconstructions and associated plate definitions.

get_paleogeography()
Retrieve paleogeographic geometries
def_plates()
Define tectonic plates

Macrostrat database definitions

Retrieve definitions for various data types stored within the Macrostrat database.

catalog()
Retrieve a complete set of definitions

Geologic features and attributes

def_environments()
Define environments
def_lithologies()
Define lithologies
def_lithology_att()
Define lithology attributes
def_econs()
Define economic resources
def_grain_sizes()
Define grain sizes
def_minerals()
Define minerals
def_structures()
Define geological structure
def_measurements()
Define measurements

Stratigraphic names

def_strat_names()
Define stratigraphic names
def_strat_name_concepts()
Define stratigraphic name concepts

Timescales and time intervals

def_timescales()
Define timescales
def_intervals()
Define Macrostrat time intervals

Miscellany

def_columns()
Define Macrostrat columns
def_drilling_sites()
Define objects associated with eODP
def_plates()
Define tectonic plates

Macrostrat database metadata

Functions for retrieving various metadata about the overall Macrostrat database.

get_stats()
Retrieve Macrostrat database statistics
def_projects()
Retrieve metadata for Macrostrat projects
def_sources()
Retrieve geologic map source definitions
def_references()
Define references
